title: Massive 2 Bed W/ Stunning Views of Auburn & Mt. Rainier Available NOW!
posting_body: The Verge is perfectly situated – close to the Sounder Transit Station, shopping, dining and entertainment.

Easy commute to downtown Seattle and the Seattle Tacoma International Airport and close to Green River Community College, the MultiCare Auburn Medical Center, The Outlet Collection and the Interurban Trail.
With sweeping views of Mount Rainier, the mountain looks so close, it feels like you could almost reach out and touch it.
Featuring a Walk Score of 87, The Verge is an easy stroll to a variety of restaurants and retail.

The spacious apartments at The Verge feature high end finishes, tall ceilings, large kitchens and bathrooms, private patios along with an expansive rooftop deck, huge fitness center and private work from home amenity spaces.
Two Level Lounge with Full Kitchen, Fireplace, Games, and TVs
Rooftop Lounge with BBQs, Fire Pits, Outdoor TV, and Sweeping Views of Mount Rainier
Business Center including Large and Small Conference Rooms, and Banquettes for Individual Seating, Small Booths for Private Conferences or Phone Use
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and Availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Contact us today for the most up to date information.
